mapper.insert: insert into tb_material (username, password, mobile, reg_time, school_type, school_system, grade, nickname, sex, avatar_url, mobile_view, mobile_down, status) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{mobile}, #{regTime}, #{schoolType}, #{schoolSystem}, #{grade}, #{nickname}, #{sex}, #{avatarUrl}, #{mobileView}, #{mobileDown}, #{status})
mapper.update: update tb_material set username=#{username}, mobile=#{mobile}, reg_time=#{regTime}, school_type=#{schoolType}, school_system=#{schoolSystem}, grade=#{grade}, nickname=#{nickname}, sex=#{sex}, avatar_url=#{avatarUrl}, mobile_view=#{mobileView}, mobile_down=#{mobileDown}, status=#{status}, modify_time=#{modifyTime} where id = #{id}
